Name: SimVoiceAssistant
About the game: SimVoiceAssistant is an addon that provides voice activated checklists functionality for any flight simulator. When used with Microsoft Flight Simulator it provides additional functionality. Features Create Your Own Voice Activated Checklists. Challenge/Response style checklists or say 'Check' to advance any checklist available. [MSFS Only] Automatic flight phase detection based checklist changing [MSFS Only] Voice controlled pushback with voice and rudder controlled pushback angle SimVoiceAssistant is for simulation use ONLY and is not an aviation training tool. SimVoiceAssistant is for entertainment purposes only.
